document.full_text: british prime minister david cameron will call for a new start in relations with pakistan on tuesday, eight months after sparking a diplomatic row by saying pakistan should not be allowed to "look both ways" on terrorism.
document.title: britain's cameron in pakistan seeking "fresh start"
lines_and_colors: british prime minister david cameron will call for a new start in relations with pakistan on tuesday, eight months after sparking a diplomatic row by saying pakistan should not be allowed to "look both ways" on terrorism.
